SEARCH
Package gw.api.validation

Interface IWebMessage

public interface IWebMessage
This is the interface for web messages associated with validation

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static IWebMessage
    create(ValidationIssue validationIssue)
    Create an new WebMessage from the validation issue.
    static IWebMessage
    create(ISeverity severity, String message)
    Constructs a message with the given severity and message.
    static IWebMessage
    create(ISeverity severity, String message, boolean retireAfterUse)
    Constructs a message with the given severity and message and retireAfterUse.
    static IWebMessage
    create(ISeverity severity, Throwable throwable)
    Constructs an error message from a Throwable.
    static IWebMessage

    Constructs an error message from a Throwable.
    static IWebMessage
    create(Object widget, ValidationIssue validationIssue)
    Deprecated.
    use create(ValidationIssue) added so that current uses can be converted

    create(Throwable throwable)
    Constructs an error message from a Throwable, probably should be displayable.
    String
    getMessage()
    This will return the text message
    String
    getOriginalContextId()
    This is for correlating the message to a specific source.

    The severity ISeverity level as a string.
    Throwable
    getThrowable()
    If the message has a backing exception this will return that value.

    The validation issue, if created as the result of a validation issue

    Whether the message is retired.
    void

    Retire the message.

  • Method Details

    • getValidationIssue

      ValidationIssue getValidationIssue()
      The validation issue, if created as the result of a validation issue
      Returns:
      the issue

    • getSeverityValue

      String getSeverityValue()
      The severity ISeverity level as a string. The instance has this as a type that is private, this is just the string value: "request_validation_error", "error", "warning""info"
      Returns:
      the severity

    • getThrowable

      Throwable getThrowable()
      If the message has a backing exception this will return that value.
      Returns:
      the exception

    • getMessage

      String getMessage()
      This will return the text message
      Returns:
      the message as a string

    • getOriginalContextId

      String getOriginalContextId()
      This is for correlating the message to a specific source.
      Returns:
      the context id

    • isRetired

      boolean isRetired()
      Whether the message is retired.
      Returns:
      true if retired

    • setRetired

      void setRetired(boolean retired)
      Retire the message. A retried message will not be displayed or affect validation, however it will prevent the same message being generated again in the same context.
      Parameters:
      retired - must be true, since we don't expect to undo retirement

    • create

      static IWebMessage create(ValidationIssue validationIssue)
      Create an new WebMessage from the validation issue.
      Parameters:
      validationIssue - the validation issue
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      static IWebMessage create(Throwable throwable)
      Constructs an error message from a Throwable, probably should be displayable.
      Parameters:
      throwable - the exception to wrap
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      static IWebMessage create(ISeverity severity, Throwable throwable)
      Constructs an error message from a Throwable.
      Parameters:
      severity - the severity of the issue
      throwable - the exception
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      static IWebMessage create(ISeverity severity, Throwable throwable, boolean retireAfterUse)
      Constructs an error message from a Throwable.
      Parameters:
      severity - the severity of the issue
      throwable - the exception
      retireAfterUse - whether to retire the message after display or keep
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      static IWebMessage create(ISeverity severity, String message)
      Constructs a message with the given severity and message.
      Parameters:
      severity - the severity of the issue
      message - the text
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      static IWebMessage create(ISeverity severity, String message, boolean retireAfterUse)
      Constructs a message with the given severity and message and retireAfterUse.
      Parameters:
      severity - the severity of the issue
      message - the text
      retireAfterUse - whether to retire the message after display or keep
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      @Deprecated static IWebMessage create(Object widget, ValidationIssue validationIssue)
      Deprecated.
      use create(ValidationIssue) added so that current uses can be converted
      Create an new WebMessage from the validation issue. This has a parameter widget, but customers do not have a good way of obtaining this internal object so should just pass null.
      Parameters:
      widget - the associated widget. May be null
      validationIssue - the validation issue
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      @Deprecated static IWebMessage create(Object widget, Throwable throwable)
      Deprecated.
      use create(Throwable) added so that current uses can be converted
      Constructs an error message from a Throwable, probably should be displayable. This has a parameter widget, but customers do not have a good way of obtaining this internal object so should just pass null.
      Parameters:
      widget - the associated widget. May be null
      throwable - the exception to wrap
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      @Deprecated static IWebMessage create(Object widget, ISeverity severity, Throwable throwable)
      Deprecated.
      use create(ISeverity,Throwable) added so that current uses can be converted
      Constructs an error message from a Throwable. This has a parameter widget, but customers do not have a good way of obtaining this internal object so should just pass null.
      Parameters:
      widget - the associated widget. May be null
      severity - the severity of the issue
      throwable - the exception
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      @Deprecated static IWebMessage create(Object widget, ISeverity severity, Throwable throwable, boolean retireAfterUse)
      Deprecated.
      use create(ISeverity,Throwable,boolean) added so that current uses can be converted
      Constructs an error message from a Throwable. This has a parameter widget, but customers do not have a good way of obtaining this internal object so should just pass null.
      Parameters:
      widget - the associated widget. May be null
      severity - the severity of the issue
      throwable - the exception
      retireAfterUse - whether to retire the message after display or keep
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      @Deprecated static IWebMessage create(Object widget, ISeverity severity, String message)
      Deprecated.
      use create(ISeverity,String) added so that current uses can be converted
      Constructs a message with the given severity and message. This has a parameter widget, but customers do not have a good way of obtaining this internal object so should just pass null.
      Parameters:
      widget - the associated widget. May be null
      severity - the severity of the issue
      message - the text
      Returns:
      new WebMessage

    • create

      @Deprecated static IWebMessage create(Object widget, ISeverity severity, String message, boolean retireAfterUse)
      Deprecated.
      use create(ISeverity,String,boolean) added so that current uses can be converted
      Constructs a message with the given severity and message and retireAfterUse. This has a parameter widget, but customers do not have a good way of obtaining this internal object so should just pass null.
      Parameters:
      widget - the associated widget. May be null
      severity - the severity of the issue
      message - the text
      retireAfterUse - whether to retire the message after display or keep
      Returns:
      new WebMessage
